  • Help

    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Board
    Interface defining the contract for the game board.
    BoardRenderer
    Renders the game board and falling bricks using JavaFX components.
    Brick
    Interface defining the contract for Tetris brick shapes.
    BrickFactory
    Factory class for creating Tetris brick instances.
    BrickFactory.BrickType
    Enum representing the different types of Tetris bricks available.
    BrickGenerator
    Interface defining the contract for generating Tetris bricks.
    BrickRotator
    Manages the rotation state of the current brick.
    ClearRow
    Represents the result of clearing completed rows from the game board.
    DownData
    Data class containing the result of a down movement event.
    EventSource
    Enum representing the source that triggered a game event.
    EventType
    Enum representing the different types of move events in the game.
    GameController
    Main controller that coordinates the game logic and view.
    GameLoop
    Manages the game's timing loop using JavaFX Timeline.
    GameMode
    Enum representing the different game modes available in the Tetris game.
    GameOverPanel
    Panel component that displays the "GAME OVER" message.
    GameOverState
    Represents the game over state.
    GameState
    Interface defining the behavior for different game states.
    GuiController
    Controller for the game's graphical user interface.
    HighScore
    Manages the high score functionality with persistent storage.
    HomeController
    Controller for the home screen/main menu.
    InputEventListener
    Interface defining the contract for handling player input events.
    InputHandler
    Handles keyboard input and translates key presses into game actions.
    Level
    Manages the game level and progression system.
    Main
    Main entry point for the Tetris game application.
    MatrixOperations
    Utility class providing static methods for matrix operations used in the game.
    MoveEvent
    Represents a move event in the game.
    NextShapeInfo
    Data class containing information about the next rotation state of a brick.
    NotificationPanel
    Animated panel component that displays score bonus notifications.
    PausedState
    Represents the paused state of the game.
    PlayingState
    Represents the normal playing state of the game.
    RandomBrickGenerator
    Implementation of BrickGenerator that creates random bricks using a queue system.
    Score
    Represents the player's score in the game.
    SimpleBoard
    Implementation of the Board interface representing the game board for Tetris.
    ViewData
    Data class containing all information needed to render the game view.
